title: 🌿 "Normal is not something to aspire to, it's something to get away from." - Jodie Foster
content:
Write a function that takes a string of slashes (\ and /) and returns all of those slashes drawn downwards in a line connecting them.

Example:

$ verticalSlashes('\\\//\/\\')
\
 \
  \
  /
 /
 \
 /
 \
  \
$ verticalSlashes('\\\\')
\
 \
  \
   \
